title.narrative: Scaling up UNIDO#s flagship #BRIDGE for Cities 4.0# event

description.narrative: The existing project titled #BRIDGE for Cities # Belt and Road Initiative: Developing green economies for cities# (SAP 160275) ensured the establishment of #BRIDGE for Cities# as a trademark initiative of UNIDO, supporting the first three editions of the event. Building upon the recognition of the initiative as an effective platform for city-to-city dialogue, this project aims at upscaling the impact of the #BRIDGE for Cities 4.0# event by internationalizing its outreach among countries and cities along the Belt and Road and beyond, with a particular focus on facilitating exchange of knowledge and learning of developing countries on how to harness the opportunities of the forth industrial revolution for smart city development and for becoming hubs of innovation.
